fgo:ExampleCard.NAME: Name

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

fgo:GardenOfAvalon.NAME: Garden of Avalon
fgo:GardenOfAvalon.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Block, !M!% NP and !M! Vigor.

fgo:IraLupus.NAME: Ira Lupus
fgo:IraLupus.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Enemy lose !D! HP. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

fgo:Camelot.NAME: Lord Camelot
fgo:Camelot.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

fgo:ImitationGodForce.NAME: Imitation God Force
fgo:ImitationGodForce.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage 4 times and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

fgo:ElementaryMyDear.NAME: Elementary My Dear
fgo:ElementaryMyDear.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL At the start of your turn, remove all Block and lose HP equal to Block to ALL enemies, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies if them have Block.

fgo:FetchFailnaught.NAME: Fetch Failnaught
fgo:FetchFailnaught.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage +10% for each Evil_Curse from the enemy. NL Apply !M! Evil_Curse. NL Double the enemy's Evil_Curse.

fgo:KurKigalIrkalla.NAME: Kur Kigal Irkalla
fgo:KurKigalIrkalla.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 3 Strength. NL Gain 3 Artifact.

fgo:Sevendrive.NAME: Sevendrive
fgo:Sevendrive.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 8 times. NL Gain !M!% NP.

fgo:MahaPralaya.NAME: Maha Pralaya
fgo:MahaPralaya.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. NL Deal additional damage equal to total debuff for all enemies.

fgo:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
fgo:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M!% NP.

fgo:YewBow.NAME: Yew Bow
fgo:YewBow.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage again.

fgo:Shishifunjin.NAME: Shishifunjin
fgo:Shishifunjin.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL All Stunned enemies lose their maximum HP !M!%.

fgo:SecondLife.NAME: Anpu Neb Ta Djeser
fgo:SecondLife.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand and Upgrade it.

fgo:LaPucelle.NAME: La Pucelle
fgo:LaPucelle.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Combust equal to half damage. NL Shuffle 1 *Burn+ into your draw pile.

fgo:CharismaOfTheJade.NAME: Charisma of the Jade
fgo:CharismaOfTheJade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Deal triple Damage whenever you have 20+ Stars.

fgo:SongOfThePoet.NAME: Song of the Poet
fgo:SongOfThePoet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain NP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

fgo:GoldenGrail.NAME: Golden Grail
fgo:GoldenGrail.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Combust X times to All enemies. NL At the end of 7-X turns, gain Seven_Beast_Crowns. NL Exhaust.

fgo:CrossingArcadia.NAME: Crossing Arcadia
fgo:CrossingArcadia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! Attack you play return Stars and gain [E].

fgo:CrystallizationofWinter.NAME: Crystallization of Winter
fgo:CrystallizationofWinter.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Guts. NL The next time you Trigger Guts, gain !M! Regen.

fgo:Chasmatis.NAME: Chasmatis
fgo:Chasmatis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evil_Curse, draw !M! card.
fgo:Chasmatis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Evil_Curse, draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 Evil_Curse.

fgo:CurtainoftheNight.NAME: Curtain of the Night
fgo:CurtainoftheNight.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade it.
fgo:CurtainoftheNight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand and Upgrade them.

fgo:ProofAndRebuttal.NAME: Proof and Rebuttal
fgo:ProofAndRebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile. NL Exhaust.
fgo:ProofAndRebuttal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put any number of cards from your hand on top of draw pile.

fgo:CharismaofAdversity.NAME: Charisma of Adversity
fgo:CharismaofAdversity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your HP is at or below 65, 50, 35 or 15, deal !D! damage each.

fgo:SarasvatiMeltout.NAME: Sarasvati Meltout
fgo:SarasvatiMeltout.DESCRIPTION: Noble_Phantasm. NL Remove all buff from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
